name: HeroGlyph
description:
HeroGlyph

A stranded cosmonaut needs to befriend a large cast of alien creatures by learning their language if she's to stand any chance of making it back home!

Made during GGJ2021 with the theme "Lost & Found". // The protagonist is lost and the new language is found piece by piece.

How to Play:
  • Move with A and D
  • When you learn an alien word it (in the form of a hieroglyph) will appear at the bottom of the screen.
  • Press an alien hieroglyph to speak it out loud.
  • Try and get back into your rocket and leave the alien planet
Good to know!
  • Press ESC to quit game at anytime!
  • Press F12 to toggle between fullscreen and small window view - We recommend playing in small window!
Credits:

  • PROGRAMMING - Jesper Uddefors aka Knase
  • Music: AIVA.com
